name: xbox-game-pass-scraper
description: The 'Xbox Game Pass Scraper' project is a web scraping tool that utilizes Puppeteer.js to extract game data from the official Xbox Game Pass website https://www.xbox.com/en-IN/xbox-game-pass/games. It gathers information about the games available on Xbox Game Pass, including their names, descriptions, platform compatibility, multiplayer status, ratings, prices, and more.
